definitions.title: adv.
definitions.body: with restrictive force, only, altogether, surely (syn. [[אַח]]);—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: only, Ge 14:24, Ge 41:40 [[רַק הַכִּסֵּא אֶגְדַּל מִמֶּךָּ]] only as regards the throne, etc., Ge 47:22 [[רַק אַדְמַת הַכּׂהֲנִים]] [[לאׁ קָנׇה]], Ge 50:8, Ex 8:5 [[רַק בַּיְאׂר תִּשָּׁאַרְנׇה]], Ex 10:17 [[וְיׇסֵר]] [[מֵעָלַי רַק הַמָּוֶת הַזֶּה]] only this death, De 2:35 (cf. De 20:14, Jos 8:2, Jos 8:27), Jos 3:11, Ju Jdg 6:39 (cf. [[אַח]] ib. Ge 18:32, Ex 10:17), Jdg 11:34 (circ. cl.) [[רַק הִיא יְחִידָה]] (there being) only she, an only one, 1Sa 1:13, Am 3:2 [[רק אתכם ידעתי]] only you have I known, etc., Job 1:15, Job 1:16, Job 1:17, Job 1:19 [[וׇאִמָּֽלְטָה]] [[רַק אֲנִי לְבַדִּי]] I only, Ps 91:8 + oft. Once strengthening [[אַח]], †Nu 12:2 ´[[הֲרַק אַח־בְּמשֶׁה דִּבֶּר י]]:. And separated (as sts. in English) from the word actually emphasized, Pr 13:10 [[רִק בְּזׇדוֹן יִתֵּן מַצָּה]] by pride there only cometh [[[נׇתַן]]

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: prefixed to sentences, to add a limitation on sthg. previously expressed (or implied), Ge 19:8 only to these men do nothing, Ge 24:8 [[רִק אֶת־בְּנִי]] [[לאׁ־תָהֵ֫נׇּה]], Ex 8:24 I will let you go . . ., only go not far, v:Ex 8:25, Nu 20:19 only—it is nothing—let me pass through on my feet (cf. De 2:28); esp. in Deut. writers, as De 10:15, De 12:15, De 20:16, 1Ki 3:2, 1Ki 3:3 (cf. 2Ki 12:4, 2Ki 14:4, 2Ki 15:4, 2Ki 15:35), 2Ki 8:19, 2Ki 11:13, 2Ki 15:14, 2Ki 15:23, 2Ki 3:2 (cf. 2Ki 14:3, 2Ki 17:2), etc., Is 4:1; emphasizing a command , De 4:9, De 12:16, De 12:23, Jos 1:7, Jos 1:18, Jos 6:18, Jos 13:6, Jos 22:5 (all D:2).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: emphasizing single words, esp. adjj., only = nought but, altogether, Ge 6:5 [[יֵחֶר מַחְשְׁבוֹת לִבּוֹ רִק רִע]] is only evil, i.e. exclusively evil, nought but evil, Ge 26:29 [[עָשִׂינוּ עִמְּךָ רִק טוֹב]] nothing but good, De 28:33 [[וְהָיִיתָ רִק עָשׁוּק]], Is 28:19 [[רִק זְוׇעָה]] it shall be nought but terror to, etc., 1Ki 14:8 (cf. [[אַח]]

definitions.title: 2 b
definitions.body: b); sq. an adv. De 28:13 [[וְהָיִיתָ רִק לְמַ֫עְלָה]] above only; sq. a vb., Ju Jdg 14:16 thou dost but hate me. †

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: after a neg., save, except (syn. [[כִּי אִם]]

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: with an affirmative, asseverative force, only, altogether = surely, Ge 20:11 [[רַק אֵין יִרְאַת אלהים במקום הזה]], De 4:6 (so EV; but Ges populus mere sapiens, so Di), 1Ki 21:25, 2Ch 28:10, Ps 32:6 [[רִק לְשֶׁטֶף מים רבים אליו]] [[לא יַגִּ֑יעוּ]]. †

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: [[רִק אִם]] ([[רִק]] prefixed for emph.) if only, provided only, De 15:5 ´[[רִק אִם שׁמוע תשׁמע וג]]:, 1Ki 8:25 ( = 2Ch 6:16) [[רִק אִם ישׁמרו בניך דרכם]] ´[[ללכת וג]]:, 2Ki 21:8 ( = 2Ch 33:8).
